original_text:
Miss Midas
Dal cilindro magico della NextGen Gaming ecco una slot davvero originale che vi farà perdere un sacco di tempo tenendovi incollati allo schermo.
La storia del Re Mida, protagonista della mitologia greca, la conosciamo tutti: il dio Dioniso aveva dato al fortunato Re la capacità speciale di tramutare in oro ogni cosa che toccava. Miss Midas immagina un protagonista di questa slot tutto al femminile: non abbiamo un Re ma una bellissima regina, con lo stesso fantastico potere.
Per quanto riguarda il gameplay, si tratta di una slot abbastanza lineare, ma non per questo l’abbiamo trovata noiosa o poco appagante dal punto di vista del divertimento. Non sono presenti giochi bonus ma solo i giri gratis attivabili grazie al simbolo Scatter.
Unica pecca è il Return To Player piuttosto basso, che si attesta su un non particolarmente entusiasmante 95% e compensato solo in parte da un jackpot che può valere 2500 volte la puntata.

I simboli d’oro di Miss Midas
La grafica di questa slot è tutta incentrata sul tema del prezioso metallo e anche i simboli lo riprendono, essendo raffigurati tutti dentro una cornice d’oro.
Sono incorniciati d’oro anche i numeri e le lettere che corrispondono alle carte da poker dal 9 all’Asso: tra tutti i simboli, questi sono quelli che pagano di meno.
I simboli tematici invece sono quelli che hanno un valore maggiore: tra questi troviamo un castello che si staglia su un cielo viola, un trono, una rosa, un cesto di frutta e un pavone, oltre che naturalmente, Miss Midas in persona.
Miss Midas non può essere che il Wild del gioco: oltre alla solita funzione di jolly, che permette di sostituire tutti gli altri simboli ad eccezione dello Scatter; inoltre, nel caso in cui compaia su tutti i cinque rulli, Miss Midas paga 500 volte la puntata
Lo Scatter è invece rappresentato dal castello fatato, che oltre a regalare un numero variabile di giri gratuiti, se appare sui rulli per cinque volte determina la vincita più alta in assoluto, pari a 2500 volte la puntata.

Funzione speciale Golden Touch
Si tratta dell’unico gioco bonus della slot, ed è associata al simbolo Scatter: durante il gioco principale (non si può accedere al Bonus Game quando si giocano i giri gratuiti) grazie a questa funzione alcuni simboli una volta che appaiono sui rulli, sono trasformati in altri diversi, incrementando la possibilità di ottenere delle combinazioni vincenti.

Midas Golden Touch: la versione maschile di Miss Midas!
Segnaliamo in conclusione la slot machine Midas Golden Touch, prodotta dalla software house Thunderkick, nella quale il protagonista è il Re Mida in persona: anche in questo caso si tratta di un gioco molto “dorato”, con una bella grafica e un jackpot che ammonta a ben 7500 gettoni!

raw_translation.response:
From the magical cylinder of NextGen Gaming comes a truly original slot game that will keep you glued to the screen for hours. We all know the story of King Midas, the protagonist of Greek mythology, who was given the special ability by the god Dionysus to turn everything he touched into gold. Miss Midas imagines a female protagonist with the same fantastic power. This beautiful queen takes center stage in this game and can turn anything she touches into gold.

When it comes to gameplay, the slot is fairly straightforward but not at all boring or unfulfilling for those seeking adventure. There are no bonus games, just free spins activated by the Scatter symbol. The only downside is the relatively low Return To Player, which is only 95%, compensated only in part by a jackpot that can be worth up to 2500 times the bet.

The symbols in Miss Midas are all centered around the theme of the precious metal, being depicted within a golden frame. The playing cards from 9 to Ace are also framed in gold, but they pay out the least. The thematic symbols, on the other hand, offer greater rewards: a castle against a purple sky, a throne, a rose, a basket of fruit, a peacock, and, of course, Miss Midas herself.

Miss Midas is the Wild symbol of the game, allowing you to replace all other symbols except the Scatter. If it appears on all five reels, Miss Midas pays out 500 times your bet. The Scatter is represented by the enchanted castle and, in addition to offering a variable number of free spins, it also determines the highest possible payout, worth 2500 times your bet.

The only bonus game in the slot is the Golden Touch, associated with the Scatter symbol: during the main game (you cannot access the Bonus Game when playing free spins), some symbols are transformed into others, increasing your chances of winning.

Finally, we mention the Midas Golden Touch slot machine, produced by the software house Thunderkick, in which King Midas himself is the protagonist. This is yet another "golden" game, with beautiful graphics and a jackpot that amounts to a whopping 7500 coins!

raw_translation.response:
From the magical cylinder of NextGen Gaming comes an original slot that will keep you glued to the screen for hours. The story of King Midas, a protagonist of Greek mythology, is well-known: the god Dionysus gave the lucky King the ability to turn anything he touched into gold. Miss Midas imagines a female protagonist with the same fantastic power as the King. 

Despite being a relatively straightforward slot, we found it quite enjoyable and far from dull. The only bonus feature is the free spins, which can be activated thanks to the Scatter symbol. However, the Return to Player rate is rather low, sitting at a not particularly exciting 95%, only partially compensated by a jackpot that can be worth 2500 times the bet. 

The graphics of this slot are focused on the precious metal, and the symbols reflect this, all pictured within a golden frame. The numbers and letters corresponding to the poker cards from 9 to Ace are also framed in gold, paying the least among the symbols. The thematic symbols instead have a higher value, including a castle against a purple sky, a throne, a rose, a fruit basket, and a peacock, as well as Miss Midas herself. 

Miss Midas is the Wild symbol of the game, and in addition to the usual function of substituting all other symbols except the Scatter, if it appears on all five reels, it pays 500 times the bet. The Scatter, on the other hand, is represented by the enchanted castle, which, in addition to giving a variable number of free spins, determines the highest possible win if it appears on the reels five times, amounting to 2500 times the bet.

The special Golden Touch function is the only bonus game in the slot, associated with the Scatter symbol. During the main game, this feature transforms some symbols into others, increasing the possibility of getting winning combinations.

In conclusion, we also recommend the slot machine Midas Golden Touch, produced by Thunderkick, in which the protagonist is King Midas himself. This is another beautifully designed "golden" game, with a jackpot of 7500 coins. Happy spinning!

The symbols in Miss Midas are all centered around the theme of the precious metal, being depicted within a golden frame. The playing cards from 9 to Ace are also framed in gold, but they pay out the least. The thematic symbols, on the other hand, offer greater rewards: a castle against a purple sky, a throne, a rose, a basket of fruit, a peacock, and, of course, Miss Midas herself.

Miss Midas is the Wild symbol of the game, allowing you to replace all other symbols except the Scatter. If it appears on all five reels, Miss Midas pays out 500 times your bet. The Scatter is represented by the enchanted castle and, in addition to offering a variable number of free spins, it also determines the highest possible payout, worth 2500 times your bet.

The only bonus game in the slot is the Golden Touch, associated with the Scatter symbol: during the main game (you cannot access the Bonus Game when playing free spins), some symbols are transformed into others, increasing your chances of winning.

Finally, we mention the Midas Golden Touch slot machine, produced by the software house Thunderkick, in which King Midas himself is the protagonist. This is yet another "golden" game, with beautiful graphics and a jackpot that amounts to a whopping 7500 coins!

Review:
 
Gameplay mechanics and bonus features

Miss Midas is a straightforward game with no complicated mechanics or multiple bonus games. The only bonus feature is the Golden Touch, activated by the Scatter symbol in the main game. During this feature, symbols are transformed into others, increasing the player's chances of winning. The game offers free spins activated by the Scatter symbol. The RTP is relatively low, at 95%, while the jackpot can be worth up to 2500 times the bet.

Theme and story

Miss Midas is a slot game that imagines a female protagonist with the same fantastic power as King Midas. The game revolves around the theme of gold, from the symbol design to the bonus features. The symbols are depicted within golden frames, with playing cards from 9 to Ace also framed in gold. The game's star, Miss Midas herself, takes center stage in a beautifully designed game that offers a unique twist on Greek mythology.

Symbol design and payouts

All symbols in Miss Midas fit the game's theme of gold and wealth. The playing cards offer the lowest payouts, while the thematic symbols offer greater rewards, such as a castle against a purple sky, a throne, a rose, a basket of fruit, a peacock, and Miss Midas herself. Miss Midas is the Wild symbol and can replace all other symbols except the Scatter. The Scatter is represented by the enchanted castle and offers a variable number of free spins, along with determining the highest possible payout, worth 2500 times the bet. The game offers a 500x payout for those who manage to get the Miss Midas symbol on all five reels.

Jackpot and Return To Player

Miss Midas offers a relatively low Return To Player of 95%. However, this may be compensated for some players by the jackpot, which can be worth up to 2500 times the bet. In comparison, the Midas Golden Touch slot machine by Thunderkick, which revolves around King Midas, offers a much higher jackpot of 7500 coins.

Overall enjoyment and entertainment value

Miss Midas offers players an entertaining slot game experience, with a unique female protagonist and a visually stunning design. While the lack of multiple bonus features may be underwhelming for some, the Golden Touch feature and free spins offer enough excitement to keep players engaged. However, the low RTP may deter some players from this game in favor of others with higher payouts. Overall, Miss Midas is a solid choice for those seeking adventure within the realm of slot games.

The symbols in Miss Midas are all centered around the theme of the precious metal, being depicted within a golden frame. The playing cards from 9 to Ace are also framed in gold, but they pay out the least. The thematic symbols, on the other hand, offer greater rewards: a castle against a purple sky, a throne, a rose, a basket of fruit, a peacock, and, of course, Miss Midas herself.

Miss Midas is the Wild symbol of the game, allowing you to replace all other symbols except the Scatter. If it appears on all five reels, Miss Midas pays out 500 times your bet. The Scatter is represented by the enchanted castle and, in addition to offering a variable number of free spins, it also determines the highest possible payout, worth 2500 times your bet.

The only bonus game in the slot is the Golden Touch, associated with the Scatter symbol: during the main game (you cannot access the Bonus Game when playing free spins), some symbols are transformed into others, increasing your chances of winning.

Finally, we mention the Midas Golden Touch slot machine, produced by the software house Thunderkick, in which King Midas himself is the protagonist. This is yet another "golden" game, with beautiful graphics and a jackpot that amounts to a whopping 7500 coins!
